response.overview: A quasi-documentary film about a large agricultural cooperative founded in 1950 in the heart of Poland. Established by peasants in an area within a huge farm belonging to a landlord near the town of Kalisz, the project was turned into a modern enterprise admired by many visitors from abroad. Also featured are inhabitants of the village and workers at the Cooperative, the Chairman Stanislaw Krolik and his family as well as other families including the Glapas, the Kulas and the Pietrzaks.
response.title: Rodzina
